title: FS: Al Shaw Piedmont 350. Elite 11 toughie - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Al Shaw Piedmont 350. Elite 11 toughie - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have this tough Al Shaw with Piedmont 350 back....member of the Elite 11.

Card is nice but has a very slight tear on the right front that goes for 1/8 an inch....

Asking $SOLD for him but will entertain offers....I wont be offended. ;)

Will also consider trades for EPDGs.


[url=https://flic.kr/p/2j1mPSH][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/49887177657_4f71458087_b.jpg[/img][/url]
Dropping him to $269 shipped.....which is a steal based on what the last few have sold for!
Nice card and a very good price.
